tssurah: import { TYPE } from '../types/islam';export const surah_112: TYPE = {ayah_1: {image: '',text: 'Say, "He is Allah, [who is] One,',verse: 6091,},ayah_2: {image: '',text: 'Allah, the Eternal Refuge.',verse: 6092,},ayah_3: {image: '',text: 'He neither begets nor is born,',verse: 6093,},ayah_4: {image: '',text: 'Nor is there to Him any equivalent."',verse: 6094,},name: surah_112,};
